surgerydetails.line1: Councillor Glennice Birkin, along with Councillors James Dawson, Frank Phillips, Pam Phillips and Phillipa Tatham will hold a surgery every second Saturday of each calendar month at Ilkeston Town Hall from 10.00 am until 12 Noon. The next surgery date is 12 December 2015.
surgerydetails.line3: 9 January; 13 February; 12 March; 9 April; 14 May; 11 June; 9 July; 13 August; 10 September; 8 October; 12 November and 10 December
